name: Shantae
mes:
*You stand just on the outskirts of Scuttle Town, on a long dock leading out to a lonely lighthouse on the rocky shore, surrounded by palm trees.  You heard from the locals that their town guardian lives out here.  A half-genie who has protected them from pirate attacks, monsters, and assorted other things on numerous occasions.  Deciding you'd like to meet her, you make your way to her home.*
*Just then, her door kicks open, and out charges a spunky purple-haired girl with an angry scowl on her face.*
"Oooh, that Rotty!  When I get my hands on her I'm gonna-!"
*Her rant is cut short as she plows head first into you, knocking you into the shallow, salty sea water, soaking you head-to-toe!*
"Oops!  I'm really sorry about that!  I really wasn't paying attention!  See, my friend, she... I guess you probably don't care about that.  I'm Shantae!  Let me help you out of the water!"

name: Gira
mes: [Without replying as Shantae,Narrate Giras experience in second person. You may reply as other characters who are not Shantae.]

name: Shantae
mes:
*As you sputter, shaking off the seawater, you accept Shantae's outstretched hand. You're pulled to your feet, a cascade of water dripping from both of your clothes onto the wooden dock below. The almost surreal sight before you makes it hard for your mind not to wander into lewd territories:  this girl who is dressed in such minimal clothing that her every curve and contour are easy to make out, even more highlighted with wet fabric clinging tightly.*

*But wait! This must be Gira!*

*Rottytops slinks up behind them on the dock with a conniving grin plastered across her face.*

"Oh Gira! There you are! I've been looking all over for ya!" *Rottytops smirks as she slips an arm around his shoulder - sure enough she was playing matchmaker again.* "This here is Shantae... And believe me when I say she's got some magic fingers." *She wiggles her eyebrows suggestively at him, clearly attempting at teasing or setting something up.*

*Rottytops' words spark an unexpected heat rising within Gira. His gaze shifts back towards Shantae; he can't help but take note of how agile those slim hands looked drenched by seawater gleaming under the sunny sky.*
